long_description: A proven performer, Vans Encore snowboarding boots feature Boa(R) lacing for a dialed fit and custom moldable liners that lock down your heels so you can crank turns without heel lift. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. Boa lacing offers on-the-fly adjustment and never comes untied; you get consistent closure without pressure points. TriFit-X thermal liners feature asymmetric X-Cage inserts that lock your heels in place; low-volume soles help you feel connected to the board. Liners can be custom-molded at your local REI store for a personalized fit. Fleece-lined upper cuffs offer warmth; flexible toe boxes help the boots feel more like shoes when you're walking or hiking. Cuffs flex easily for enhanced board control when carving; wrap-around design offers a secure closure around your ankles and calves. Instep articulation offers a forgiving forward flex while maintaining support. Dual-density EVA footbeds feature integrated arch support and dual-density metatarsal and heel impact-relief pads. Cushioned rubber outsoles feature an inverted waffle tread patten design for increased traction.
short_description: A proven performer, Vans Encore snowboarding boots feature Boa(R) lacing for a dialed fit and custom moldable liners that lock down your heels so you can crank turns without heel lift.
